cancelElection(uint256).details: Only election creator can cancel, and only before deadline passes

params._electionId: The ID of the election to cancel

createElection(string,string,string,stri.details: Validates all input parameters and initializes election state

params._deadline: Duration in minutes until election ends
params._image: IPFS hash or image URL for election

getElectionById(uint256).details: Returns election details without candidates array

params._electionId: The ID of the election to retrieve

getElectionByIdWithResult(uint256).details: Only returns data after election deadline has passed

params._electionId: The ID of the election to retrieve

returns._0: ElectionViewResult struct containing election details and results

getElectionWithCandidates(uint256).details: Allows voters to see candidates during active elections

params._electionId: The ID of the election to retrieve

returns._0: ElectionWithCandidates struct with candidates (vote counts set to 0 if election is active)
Array of ElectionView structs containing election details

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote(uint256,uint256,string).details: Validates election exists, is active, voter hasn't voted, and candidate ID is valid

params._candidateId: The ID of the candidate to vote for (1-indexed)
params._electionId: The ID of the election to vote in

cancelElection(uint256).notice: Cancels an election before its deadline

createElection(string,string,string,stri.notice: Creates a new election with specified candidates and deadline

getElectionById(uint256).notice: Retrieves basic details for a specific election

getElectionByIdWithResult(uint256).notice: Retrieves results for a specific election

getElectionWithCandidates(uint256).notice: Retrieves election with candidate names (vote counts hidden until deadline)

getElections().notice: Retrieves all elections with their current state

transferToNewOwner(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new address (only owner)

vote(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Submits a vote for a candidate in an election
